title: Ruthenium complex based nanocomposite film with enhanced and selective electrochemical sensing of bifenthrin pesticide
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,29542-29558
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA04188G, Paper

Sanjeev Bhandari, Bhaskar Sen, Snehadrinarayan Khatua, L. Robindro Singh, Vijay Singh Parihar, Mrityunjoy Mahato
Bifenthrin (BF), a widely used pyrethroid pesticide in farming, lacks highly sensitive and selective sensors despite its extensive application.
